flawed_nl_solution:
He has to climb 9*10=<<9*10=90>>90 feet
That means he needs to climb 90*12=<<90*12=1800>>1800 inches
That means he needs to climb 1800/18=<<1800/18=100>>100 stairs
#### 100

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1080, not 1800. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
